{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","title":"In-Room Dining","description":"

Delivered directly to your room, our in-room dining menu boasts an array of delicious selections to satisfy every palate. From traditional American breakfast or our signature ANZU cheeseburger to assorted sandwiches, fresh salads, and the comfort of our hearty Udon Noodle Soup, you can indulge in a diverse culinary journey that blends the freshness of California with the refined flavors of Japan.

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","title":"Breakfast","description":"

Begin your morning with our abundant buffet and expertly-curated la carte selections. Experience a harmonious blend of Eastern and Western culinary excellence, from savory notes of Smoked Salmon Benedict to the bold flavors of Japanese favorites like Chicken Okayu and Seaweed Salad. Let each bite inspire your day and awaken your senses in a truly unique dining experience.

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","title":"Sunday Brunch","description":"

Step into a Sunday Brunch experience beyond the ordinary. Savor the sizzle of eggs cooked to perfection and the delicate sweetness of buttermilk pancakes, while expert chefs craft exquisite bite-sized creations at live stations. Delight in the rich flavors of Japanese udon and explore a buffet showcasing smoked salmon and artisan cheeses. For a perfect finish, indulge in our decadent desserts. Plus, enjoy our signature tea service or raise a glass of Louis Roederer Champagne in celebration.

Delivered directly to your room, our in-room dining menu boasts an array of delicious selections to satisfy every palate. From traditional American breakfast or our signature ANZU cheeseburger to assorted sandwiches, fresh salads, and the comfort of our hearty Udon Noodle Soup, you can indulge in a diverse culinary journey that blends the freshness of California with the refined flavors of Japan.
